description:
Amendments to planning permission reference 98/1241 dated 13th April, 1999, as follows:- 

 1.  Relocation of bin/cycle store to 5 Elliott's Place. 2.  Demolition of existing single storey side extension and     erection of two storey side extension. 3.  Changes to window (note that obscure glazing would be     maintained as existing at first floor level). 4.  Change to profile of mansard roof. 5.  Change from dormers to weavers loft. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  1684/P/100 B                         Letters from GML dated 16th November                         2001, 14th August, 2001, and 23rd                         July, 2001.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
